TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Popup extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class Popup Inherits FrameworkElement Implements IAddChild
public ref class Popup : System::Windows::FrameworkElement, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild

summary.span: 表示具有内容的弹出窗口。

span.span: Represents a pop-up window that has content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **内容模型**:具有一个内容的属性： 。**Content Model**: has one content property: . A的一个子级，可以是任何最多可以有。A can have a maximum of one child, which can be any . 下图显示具有控件作为其父级。The following illustration shows a control that has a as its parent. ![Popup 图](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup 图")![Popup illustration](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup illustration") 您可以通过设置定位一个弹出窗口， ， ， ，和属性。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). 当显示在屏幕上，它不会重新本身如果其父重新定位。When is displayed on the screen, it does not reposition itself if its parent is repositioned. A中其自己的窗口在屏幕上显示其内容。A displays its content in its own window on the screen. A控件支持动画时属性设置为`true`和完全信任运行该应用程序。A control supports animation when the property is set to `true` and the application is running with full trust. 运行完全信任的应用程序拥有对系统资源的完全访问权限，并通常安装在用户的系统。An application that is running with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the user's system. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md). 要显示在内容上的位图和不透明度效果，必须直接在上设置影响内容。For bitmap and opacity effects to appear on the content of a , you must set the effects directly on the content. 内容不会继承设置的效果控制的任何其他元素，则在父窗口。The content of a does not inherit effects that are set on the control or on any other element that is in the parent window. A默认情况下大小调整为其内容。A is sized to its content by default. 在这种情况，应用或位图效果可能会导致变得模糊。When this occurs, applying a or bitmap effects may cause the to be obscured. 发生这种情况是因为内容的默认大小不提供空间不足，无法正常显示效果。This occurs because the default size of the content does not provide enough area for the effects to display. 如果需要更多空间，则可以定义边距内容以提高可供该控件的区域。If more space is required, you can define a margin around the content to increase the area that is available to the control. 属性必须设置上中使用时[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]。The property must be set on the when used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]. 若要创建工具提示，使用和类。To create a tooltip, use the and classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ToolTip 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview.md)。For more information, see [ToolTip Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建控件。The following example shows how to create a control. [!code-xaml[PopupSimple#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-csharp[PopupSimple#CreatePopup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#createpopup)] [!code-vb[PopupSimple#CreatePopup](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#createpopup)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowsTransparency { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示 控件是否可以包含透明的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control can contain transparent content.

value.span: 如果 控件可以包含透明内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can contain transparent content; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件仅可以包含透明内容，以完全信任的应用程序运行时。A control can only contain transparent content when the application runs with full trust. 运行完全信任的应用程序拥有对系统资源的完全访问权限，并通常安装在本地系统上。An application that runs with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the local system. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md). 此属性不能设置为`true`时中托管[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]。This property cannot be set to `true` when the is hosted in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]. 如果属性设置为`true`的应用程序不会运行在完全信任中属性值更改为`false`。If the property is set to `true` in an application that does not run in full trust, the property value is changed to `false`. 在浏览器托管的应用程序不会运行在完全信任的应用程序示例。An application that is hosted in a browser is an example of an application that does not run in full trust. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性控件。The following example shows how to set the property on a control. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#allowstransparency)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#allowstransparency)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#allowstransparency)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the control.

value.span: 控件的 内容。

span.span: The content of the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks **内容模型**:属性为只包含内容属性控件。**Content Model**: The property is the only content property for the control. A只能有一个如子级，但该子级可以包含复杂嵌入的内容。A can only have one as a child, but that child can contain complex embedded content. 例如，可以是子包含，文本和其他类型的控件。For example, the child can be a that contains an , text, and other types of controls. 当将内容添加到控件，控件变为对内容的逻辑父级。When content is added to a control, the control becomes the logical parent to the content. 同样，内容被视为可的逻辑子级。Similarly, the content is considered to be the logical child of the . 子内容不会添加到包含的可视化树控件。The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the control. 相反，将子内容呈现在单独的窗口具有自身可视化树时设置为`true`。Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window with its own visual tree when the is set to `true`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将内容添加到控件。The following example shows how to add content to a control. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#Child](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#child)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#Child](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#child)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#Child](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#child)]

summary.span: 将子元素附加到 控件。

span.span: Attaches a child element to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可能想要创建的自定义控件具有与现有控件相同的功能，还展示的行为。You might want to create a custom control that has the same functionality as an existing control and also exhibits the behavior of a . 你可以使控件的行为类似于通过添加到控件并调用方法。You can make your control behave like a by adding a to your control and calling the method. 此方法将分配`child`到子属性，并将绑定到以下属性`child`。This method assigns `child` to the child property and binds the following properties to `child`. - - - - - - - - 你应该按照控件使其成为可中的依赖项属性使用相同的方式实现这些。You should implement these as dependency properties in your control so it can be used the same way as a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义依赖属性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties.md)。For more information, see [Custom Dependency Properties](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties.md). 当调用，`child`不能为的子。When you call , `child` cannot be a child of a . 此外，`PlacementTarget`之前调用此方法应在控件上设置。Also, `PlacementTarget` should be set on your control before you call this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将内容添加到控件，控件变为对内容的逻辑父级。When you add content to a control, the control becomes the logical parent to the content. 同样，内容被视为可的逻辑子级。Similarly, the content is considered to be the logical child of the . 子内容不会添加到包含的可视化树控件。The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the control. 相反，在单独的窗口具有其自己 visual 呈现子内容树时属性设置为`true`。Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window that has its own visual tree when the property is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode Placement { System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件打开时的控件方向，并指定 控件在与屏幕边界重叠时的控件行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation of the control when the control opens, and specifies the behavior of the control when it overlaps screen boundaries.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定 控件打开时的控件方向，并指定该控件与屏幕边界交互的方式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the orientation of the control when the control opens, and that specifies how the control interacts with screen boundaries.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过设置定位一个弹出窗口， ， ， ，和属性。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). 如果属性是`true`，则设置到或反转的位置;与设置为对齐其左边的缘与边缘和与设置为对齐其右边缘的左边缘与。If the property is `true`, setting to or reverses the position of the ; a with set to aligns its left edge with the right edge of and a with set to aligns its right edge with the left edge of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建四个相对于图像的控件。The following example creates four controls that are relative to an image. 每个具有不同的位置属性的值。Each has a different value for the placement property. summary.span: 获取或设置用于打开和关闭 控件的动画。

span.span: Gets or sets an animation for the opening and closing of a control.

value.span: 枚举值，该值定义用于打开和关闭 控件的动画。

span.span: The enumeration value that defines an animation to open and close a control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以仅进行动画处理时属性设置为`true`。A can only animate when the property is set to `true`. 这要求的应用程序创建控件运行完全信任。This requires the application that creates the control to run with full trust. 如果进行动画处理，不进行动画处理。If the is animated, the will not be animated. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StaysOpen { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 控件焦点不再对准时，是否关闭该控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control closes when the control is no longer in focus.

value.span: 如果在 属性设置为 时关闭 控件，则为 ；如果在 控件外发生鼠标或键盘事件时关闭 控件，则为 。

span.span: if the control closes when property is set to ; if the control closes when a mouse or keyboard event occurs outside the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，始终处于打开状态，直到将其显式关闭通过设置属性`false`。When the property is set to `true`, stays open until it is explicitly closed by setting the property to `false`. 当是`false`、控件截获所有的鼠标和键盘事件，以确定当这些事件之一发生之外控件。When is `false`, the control intercepts all mouse and keyboard events to determine when one of these events occurs outside the control. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#staysopen)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#staysopen)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#staysopen)]
